Expression: annotate persons table after workplace_location model has run
auto time to work - free flow travel time in both directions. MTC TM1 was MD and MD
auto savings over walk or transit capped at 120 and normalized to unity
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.AGREMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.FOOEMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.FPSEMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.HEREMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.MWTEMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.OTHEMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
np.where(reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id)>0, reindex(land_use.RETEMPN, persons.workplace_zone_id) / reindex(land_use.TOTEMP, persons.workplace_zone_id), 0)
